What is required to create a currency with a specific name on Verus?

What is the significance of having an ID with the same name as the currency I want to create?

Having an ID with the same name as the currency you want to create gives you control over the creation of that currency. You, as the controller of the ID, are the only one who can create a currency with that name, and you can only do so once. This ensures that currency names are unique and can be trusted to belong to a specific entity or individual.

Can I create multiple currencies with the same name on Verus?

No, you cannot create multiple currencies with the same name on Verus. The controller of an ID can only create a currency with that name once. This ensures that currency names are unique and can be trusted to belong to a specific entity or individual.
